titleStmt.title: Contra Paganos De Civitate Dei: A Digital Edition of the Oldest Surviving Manuscript
titleStmt.author: Aurelius Augustinus

availability.p: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike International 4.0 License

msContents.p: Books 11-16. Annotations by Ireneo Pacifico (778-846) and Raterio da Verona (887-974).

binding.p: Bound in rigid parchment, possibly in 18th century, and rebound using the same support in 1926.

origin.p: Written in North Africa in the early 5th century.

encodingDesc.p: The following text was encoded in accordance with EpiDoc standards and with the CTS/CITE Architecture.

div.ab:

TIBUS ANIMORUM SED PLANE SUMMEŇAE The cauda was added later DIS
POSITIONE PROUIDENTIAE SUPER OMNES
OMNIUM GENTIUM LITTERAS OMNIA SIBI GE
NERA INGENIORUM UMANORUM DIUINA

PE SCRIBTUM EST GLORIOSA DICTA SUNT DE TE

EST IMPIORUM ET SUPERBORUM QUI EJUS

DUARUM ISTARUM CIUITATUM IN AN

RE NON POSSUMUS DE HIS ALIOS TESTES

RUNT ATQUE ADQUE ITA DE CETERIS QUAE AD SUUM
